org.rapla.mobile.android.utility

Class MobileCalendarUrlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.mobile.android.utility.MobileCalendarUrlBuilder

  • public class MobileCalendarUrlBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds an url for the mobile view of a calendar. The url pattern is http://{HOST}:{PORT}/rapla?page=mobile&user={USER}&file={CALENDAR}&android-client=1 .
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit
